mapper.select: SELECT BOARD.BOARD_CODE , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_CONTENT , DATE_FORMAT(BOARD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BOARD_DATE , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM STUDYROOM_BOARD BOARD LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_IMG IMG ON BOARD.BOARD_CODE = IMG.BOARD_CODE WHERE BOARD.BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDYROOM_MEMBER SET BOARD_ANSWER = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_CODE , BOARD_TITLE , DATE_FORMAT(BOARD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BOARD_DATE , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_SECRET FROM STUDYROOM_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_CODE DESC LIMIT 3;
